data.title: Lisa Laporte on LinkedIn: The TWiT.tv community is facing challenges with membership growth. 👇 💥…
data.meta_description:
The TWiT.tv community is facing challenges with membership growth. 👇 

💥 We missed all goals over the last three years, and because we are facing more…
data.text:
Just a reminder to all who are still interested in a new LPFM station for their organization. Thursday (September 28) is the last full day I am taking Show of Interest requests at REC for application handling. Please visit https://LPFM.app to start the process. We will have the following requirements from the get go: * The organization must already have an active corporate status with any state. (Make sure you let us know which state it is) * You must already have a tower/antenna site picked out and you use that site in your search. * You must have assurance from the site owner or their authorized representative to use that site in the event of a grant. You will need to provide us with their name and telephone number (we are not going to call them, but it needs to be on the application). Additional tips: * Please get an FRN from the FCC CORES system. You will need your organization's IRS EIN to fill out that form. * Think about your organization's educational statement. The FCC will need to know, to get you through the process: (1) what educational objectives does your organization have before broadcasting and (2) how will a radio station advance those educational objectives. * Knowing your proposed technical parameters, such as how high of a tower you will be able to place at a location if there isn't one already there or knowing what heights are available on an existing tower will be very helpful. * Gather your board members information including name, their title, their residential address, their telephone number and email address. Qualifications: * Organization must either have their headquarters location or 75% of the board members with the local area. * Local area is considered within 20 miles, except in counties considered Nielsen Audio top-50 metro market counties where the distance is 10 miles. * Board members should have no past felony arrests, not previously engaged in pirate radio, have no other AM/FM/TV broadcast ownership holdings or board memberships and are not denied student loans and other federal benefits because of past drug convictions.

After the Digital Markets Act entered into force, I received questions from non-EU game devs trying to determine if the rights and safeguards brought by the act also cover them. Leading global talent and some of the best public funding instruments are no longer the only key reasons to have a studio in the EU. If you have a studio in the EU, you have the right and means to fight back when a gatekeeper platform removes your game from an application store. Therefore, these Commission's preliminary conclusions on Apple's non-compliance and notification of further investigations on Apple's compliance with DMA are crucial. They demonstrate that the Commission is taking action to ensure that the new rights of game developers are correctly implemented and that the Commission is taking the feedback from stakeholders like EGDF seriously. If you have any further concerns about Apple's Core Technology fee, Apple's user journey to download and install games outside the Apple Appstore or the eligibility requirements for launching your own third-party application stores or making your games available for sideloading directly from the web, do not hesitate to share them with the Commission. If you are afraid of sharing the information directly, EGDF is more than happy to share feedback with the Commission on your behalf. https://lnkd.in/ghjth6P3

I am thrilled to announce the return of Flash.gr, a stalwart in the realm of information dissemination. With a renewed sense of vigor and determination, Flash.gr re-establishes itself as a robust source of information in an environment characterized by rapid developments and an imperative need for accurate reporting. The revitalized Flash.gr leverages contemporary technological advancements to deliver news and invaluable insights across diverse platforms. Our journalistic team combines experience and reliability, embodying the standards expected of a distinguished entity like Flash.gr, while also incorporating a modern perspective on the new generation in Greek journalism. Returning to the forefront of media, Flash.gr, with its rich history of leaving an indelible mark on major events in Greece and worldwide, pledges to shed light on the intricacies of current affairs. Our commitment remains unwavering, as we navigate the evolving media landscape with a focus on delivering timely, well-researched, and inclusive content. Flash.gr is back, poised contribute meaningfully to the discourse that shapes our collective understanding of the world.

WISPA should be extremely influential because it represents the heart and soul of America. 🇺🇸 WISPA represents mom and pop small businesses across the nation who are pouring their sweat, blood, tears, and money into building better connectivity for their local communities. Unfortunately, instead of being influential, WISPA is woefully mismanaged by good ol’ boys who are lining up at the trough in search of government handouts. 🐷 WISPA Group 2.0 is a parody group. Unlike the legacy WISPA Group, this group values free expression and outside opinion. We are not trying to force consensus. This group also understands the importance of vendors. We do not prohibit vendors from sharing their WISP related products and services. Instead we encourage it! This is an unmoderated group which means the algorithms will decide what content is relevant and the First Amendment (and Facebook's Terms of Service) will decide what is allowed. If you don't like what someone has to say, scroll, unfollow, or block. You don't get to control the conversation for everyone else. https://lnkd.in/eGeBh9YE

🔒 Lock In Your Membership Rate for 3 Years at Just $200/Year! 🔒 For most of my career, I didn't feel the need to join a community of designers. Working alongside other creatives was my norm. But as the industry evolved, so did my work environment. Remote work, being the sole graphic designer at a company—it got lonely, and I found myself yearning for connection and mentorship opportunities. Joining the Graphic Artists Guild in 2020 was one of the best decisions I've ever made. 🌟 Here’s why: 🧑🎨𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝘆 & 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: The Guild has become my go-to place for connecting with fellow professionals. We share insights, tackle professional challenges together, and provide mutual support. 🧑🎓𝗠𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗢𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: I love mentoring younger designers. The Guild offers a platform to continue this passion, answering new designers and members' questions, and helping them navigate their careers. 📈𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵: Monthly webinars provide fresh insights into our industry and highlight key areas I might be missing as an entrepreneur, not just a freelance graphic designer. 🧑⚖️𝗔𝗱𝘃𝗼𝗰𝗮𝗰𝘆 & 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝗱𝗲: The Guild’s dedication to advocating for our profession makes me proud to be a member and a volunteer on their Board of Directors. If you're a graphic artist seeking community, now's the perfect time to join! Lock in your membership rate for 3 years at just $200/year and dive into this vibrant, quirky, and supportive community. 🔗 Secure your rate now: 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸 𝗶𝗻 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 🔗 Don't miss out on the benefits of being part of the Guild—let’s grow and thrive together! 𝘗.𝘚. 𝘐𝘧 𝘺𝘰𝘶'𝘳𝘦 𝘢 𝘴𝘵𝘶𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵, 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘪𝘴 𝘢𝘭𝘴𝘰 𝘢 𝘴𝘵𝘶𝘥𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘢𝘷𝘢𝘪𝘭𝘢𝘣𝘭𝘦! #GraphicArtistsGuild #Community #GraphicDesign #ProfessionalGrowth #Mentorship #Advocacy #Illustration

Here is an end of year bonus for my long term clients only; but I decided to open it up to new clients too!!! 10 percent off to for 6 months today only until 11:30pm CST! You can sign up today and restart your program in February so you can have January OFF to decompress, travel and re-connect with loved ones. Most of my clients are re-starting February 5th and going 24 weeks after that. January is adult playtime month in our books lol! Would like to take advantage of this end of year offer?
